description: {"blocks":[{"key":"a6m8j","text":"This step-by-step protocol describes the cDNA synthesis, primer pools preparation and multiplex PCR conditions with the main goal to sequence the complete genome of DENV2 serotype strains.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"d6nb3","text":" SuperScript™ IV First-Strand Synthesis System. (200 reactions) Cat: 18091200 Invitrogen ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77ib2","text":" Q5® High-Fidelity 2X Master Mix. Cat: M0492L NEB, H20 Ultre Pure, primers described in table 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"82ko2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"97nh4","text":"In order to prepare the solution to use in the Multiplex PCR, dilute each pool 1:10. {"blocks":[{"key":"b3ng1","text":"Add  2,5µl of cDNA (totalling 5µl) in 22,5µl of the pool1 and pool2 reaction and take it to the thermocycler following the conditions bellow:","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63nqn","text":"\t","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"33lln","text":"Step1:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"djtnp","text":"98ºC ---- 30 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8np8","text":"Step2: (45 cycles)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ebcdj","text":"98ºC ---- 15 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6lm0q","text":"58ºC ---- 30 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8dcp2","text":"72ºC ---- 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2kjaj","text":"Step3:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqf96","text":"72ºC ---- 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6uae","text":"Hold 4ºC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"flr9b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
